title:
Primordial Black Holes in Induced Gravity Inflationary Models with Two
  Scalar Fields
abstract:
We propose a two-field inflationary model with the induced gravity term.
Using conformal transformation of the metric, we get the chiral cosmological
model with two scalar fields. We demonstrate that the constructed inflationary
model do not contradict to observation data and is suitable for primordial
black hole (PBH) formation. The estimation of PBH masses allows to consider
PBHs as dark matter candidates.
